    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static BCParametersTranslator getInstance()
        Returns:
        a static instance of BCParametersTranslator

      • translateParameter

        public org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters translateParameter(java.security.Key key,
                                                          java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec param)
        Translates the key and the parameters into a CipherParameter of BC. If one of the arguments is null then pass to one of the other two translateParameter functions.
        Parameters:
        key - the KeySpec to translate to CipherParameters of BC
        param - The additional AlgorithmParametersSpec to transform including the key to relevant CipherParameter

      • translateParameter

        public org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters translateParameter(java.security.Key key)
        This function translates a secret key into a KeyParameter or other asymmetric key parameters.
        Parameters:
        key - the key
        Returns:
        KeyParameter this is used in may of the bc BlockCipher and bc StreamCipher. AssymetricKeyParameter for trapdoor permutation and asymmetric encryption

      • translateParameter

        public org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters translateParameter(java.security.spec.AlgorithmParameterSpec param)
        This function gets an on object of type AlgorithmParameterSpec and converts it or translates it to a suitable CipherParameters object of Bouncy Castle, if exists.
        Parameters:
        param - the AlgorithmParameterSpec to translate
        Returns:
        a CipherParameters object from Bouncy Castle that matches the param passed as argument if exists, otherwise returns null

      • translateParameter

        public org.bouncycastle.crypto.CipherParameters translateParameter(java.security.Key key,
                                                          java.security.SecureRandom random)
        Translates the key and the source of randomness into a CipherParameter of BC. If one of the arguments is null then pass to one of the other two translateParameter functions.
        Parameters:
        key - the Key to translate to CipherParameters of BC
        random - the source of randomness to translate
